Blog.post: as you may have noticed, i use the words tis, twas etc. alot. i only wish there were more of this it + is contraction-like things. who will join me in a revolution to create more?? t'will, t'had, t'am, t'are, etc. will be added to the english dictionary and the world would will be a better place... *note - this may require the hypnosis of several/all english teachers in the U.S. so come prepared. All revolutionaries meet at my house friday night for an important meeting and plans. slowride...

schools out!!!!! ...except for finals have fun everyone and hopefully i can see you all. and remember - orange popsicles are the best. if u werent invited to the Miss Scarlet (my awesome band) concert, twas awesome. -slowride

us know what sucks? overplayed music... thus the name ^^^ kryptonite tis a good song, but mucho mucho overplayedness. i just thought i'd bring that up since im listening to it right now. anyway, speaking of music.. classic rock baby! this is where its at.if you dont agree, ur missing out. Automatic189

as i explained in absolutely no detail last post, band sucks. Here is where i go into extreme detail : band sucks, alot . thats all you must know. 3 hour band practice... at priory... walking about 3 miles... with a basedrum... one 5 minute break... enough complaining - listen to our new limelight show, its THE best last show. its like a season finale for a tv show.. except it doesnt suck. Limelight will be back next season!!(year)to take over the world! i mean.. u didnt hear that ok back to complaining - AHHH band sucks! ok enough complaining - bharats leaving fenwick... thats depressing, kinda.

Hey listen to the radio show of the century. tis at www.fenwickfriars.com, click internet radio, click "limelight", and listen to all shows there. It might take a total of about 3 hours, but its for a good cause. Think of it this way: its better than making out with a dead man(?). yes, so as i said my name is alex. theres some other characters on the show, but im probably the coolest. um . . next monday is our next show. if u want to earn my respect, listen to it live. We might have a guest whos gonna play some geet for us but we shall see. next are my personal reflections on band: it sucks and umm, don't join although there are some really cool people in band. basically everyone is awesome, excluding a certain few, but thats beside the point. yeah! no sarcasm later

i am a sarcastic person... i cannot help it who shares in my mourning that sarcasm cannot be shown on the computer?? anyway, that last so called blog thing was filled with sarcasm so im gonna try to stop using that...

Hey ive been developing this blog for er.. a couple years now. im glad its finally coming together.its too bad dan nemeth had to copy my idea of blogging but thats cool, hes still a pretty good friend. it looks as if he wants to compete with me here, so ill have to put him in his place. ya so my names alex - province. thus the names alpro, aprov, alprov, apro, prov(bharat[a weird kid{Kasuma}]), aprovince, aince, PJ, alince, alice, providential, xela ecnivorp(backwards), penis, and bob u can call me any of those names except for penis and i would appreciate that. on to greater things.. yes i have no life and i sit at my computer for hours daily, but at least i dont read blogs.. (losers)ehem later people u losers...
slow ride - by foghat good song if you didnt know

Ahh, summer. whats to say? go have fun, enjoy your time away from skoo, and stop reading my unimportant words. i know i will but when u get bored(ya it does happen sometimes, even in summer) read this and i might have more posts by the end of the summer.
